); } import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; function App() { const [now, setNow] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { function update() { const d = new Date(); const optionsDate = { weekday: 'long', day: 'numeric', month: 'long', year: 'numeric' }; const optionsTime = { hour: 'numeric', minute: 'numeric' }; const dateStr = d.toLocaleDateString('ar-EG', optionsDate); const timeStr = d.toLocaleTimeString('ar-EG', optionsTime); setNow(`${dateStr} ${timeStr}`); } update(); const t = setInterval(update, 60000); return () => clearInterval(t); }, []); return (
